transcript: Are you kidding? We'd miss it. We just got here. What's going to coming down here if we just turn around to go home?

segments.text: Are you kidding? We'd miss it. We just got here. What's going to coming down here if we just turn around to go home?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Are you kidding?  We'd miss it.  We just got here.  What's the point of coming down here if we just turn around and go home?
